usrOrigin.as.inDev

                User origin in device coordinates

Usage

                usrOrigin.as.inDev()
    
Value

                A double vector containing the location of the
                user origin in "page coordinates", i.e., inches
                to the right and above the bottom-left corner of
                the device.

Warning

                Intended for use with devices containing a
                single plot.  Expect strange results if the
                device contains multiple plots.
